en: To receive personalised advice, enter your personal information by tapping 'Settings'.
da: For at appen kan tilpasse information til dine individuelle behov, bedes du indtaste dine personlige oplysninger. Tryk på 'Indstillinger' for at fortsætte.
nl: Klik op 'Instellingen' om de app te personaliseren.

no: For at appen skal tilpasse tilbakemeldingene du får, anbefaler vi at du legger inn den personlige informasjonen din. Trykk på 'Innstillinger' for å fortsette.
el: Για να σας δώσει η εφαρμονή μια πιο προσωπική αναφορά, σας συνιστούμε να εισάγετε τα προσωπικά σας δεδομένα. Επιλέξτε "Ρυθμίσεις" για να συνεχίσετε
it: Per permettere all'app di personalizzare i feedback forniti, raccomandiamo di inserire in input le tue informazioni personali. Cliccare ‘Impostazioni’ per procedere
de: Wenn sich die App Ihre Rückmeldungen anpassen soll, empfehlen wir, dass Sie Ihre persönliche Informationen eingeben. Drücken Sie auf dem 'Dashboard' um weiterzumachen
es: Para recibir consejos personalizados, recomendamos que introduzcas tu información personal. Haz click en "Ajustes" para continuar.
fr: Pour que l'app puisse personnaliser le retour qui vous est donné, nous vous recommandons d'entrer vos informations personnelles. Appuyer sur 'Paramètres' pour continuer.
et: To receive personalised advice, enter your personal information by tapping 'Settings'.
ja: To receive personalised advice, enter your personal information by tapping 'Settings'.

en: If you choose not to do so, ClimApp will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.
da: Hvis du ikke vil indtaste dine personlige oplysninger vil appen benytte foruddefinerede værdier. Tryk på 'Instrumentbræt' for at fortsætte.
nl: Als u niet hiervoor kiest zal ClimApp de vooraf bepaalde waardes gebruiken. Klik op 'Dashboard' op verder te gaan.
sv: Om du inte känner för att göra det, inga problem, appen kommer att använda förinställda värden istället. Tryck på 'Dashboard' för att fortsätta.
no: Hvis du ikke har lyst til å gjøre det, er det ikke noe problem, da vil appen bruke forhåndsdefinerte verdier i stedet. Trykk på 'Dashbord' for å fortsette.
el: Αν δεν αισθάνεστε άνετα με αυτό, κανένα πρόβλημα, η εφαρμογή θα χρησιμοποιήσει προκαθορισμένες τιμές. Επιλέξτε "Πίνακας" για να συνεχίσετε.
it: Se preferisci non fornire le tue informazioni personali, non ti preoccupare, l'app utilizzerà i valori predefiniti. Selezionare ‘Dashboard’ per continuare
de: Wenn das Ihnen nicht gefällt, ist es kein Problem, da die App stattdessen vorher definierten Werte verwendet. Drücken Sie auf dem 'Dashboard' um weiterzumachen.
es: Si prefieres no proveer tu información personal, no te preocupes, la app utilizará valores predeterminados. Haz click en "Tablero" para continuar.
fr: Si vous ne voulez pas le faire, pas de problème, l'app utilisera des valeurs prédéfinies à la place. Appuyer sur 'Tableau de bord' pour continuer.
et: If you choose not to do so, ClimApp will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.
ja: If you choose not to do so, ClimApp will use predefined values instead. Tap 'Dashboard' to proceed.

en: Several new features will be implemented over the next two years. Therefore all users should be aware that frequent updates and changes to the layout and content might occur.
da: Denne applikation er stadig under udvkling. Nye funktionaliteter vil blive tilføjet - af denne årsag informerer vi brugeren om, at hyppige opdateringer og ændringer til indhold og design kan forekomme.
nl: Verschillende nieuwe functies zullen geïmplementeerd worden de komende twee jaar. Alle gebruikers zouden geïnformeerd moeten zijn dat er regelmatig updates en veranderingen optreden van de layout en de inhoud.

it: Numerose nuove funzionalità saranno implementate durante i prossimi due anni. Informiamo pertanto tutti gli utenti che potrebbero essere effettuati frequenti aggiornamenti e cambi al layout e al contenuto
de: Diese Applikation ist weiterhin in Entwicklung. Mehere neue Funktionen werden im Laufe der nächsten zwei Jahren implementiert. Deswegen wird der Benutzer darum informiert, dass häufige Aktualisierungen und Änderungen in Layout und Inhalt vorkommen können.
es: En el transcurso de los próximos dos años serám implementadas varias características nuevas. Por lo tanto, todos los usuarios deben estar informados de que pueden ocurrir actualizaciones frecuentes y cambios en el diseño y el contenido.
fr: Cette application est encore en cours de développement. De nombreuses nouvelles fonctionnalités seront ajoutées au cours des deux prochaines années. de: Nach der Wettervorhersage ist es nicht besonders warm. Jedoch sind Sie möglicherweise überkleidet für die gewählte Aktivitätsebene, und Sie können eine thermische Belastung erleben.
es: Según el informe meteorológico, no hace mucho calor. Sin embargo, puedes estar usando mucha ropa para el nivel de actividad que has elegido y puede producirse estrés por calor.
fr: Le temps n'est pas très chaud. Cependant, votre niveau de protection vestimentaire est peut-être trop élevé par rapport au niveau d'activité que vous avez choisi et vous pourriez expérimenter un stress hyperthermique.

it: Per l’imprementazione dell’UTCI è stato utilizzato il procedimento operativo pubblicato all’interno del International Journal of Biometeorology (doi:10.1007/s00484-011-0454-1). Lo sviluppo dell’UTCI è stato sostenuto dalla Commissione Europea attraverso la EU COST Action 730.
de: UTCI-Implementation verwendet das Betriebsverfahren veröffentlicht im International Journal of Biometeorology (doi:10.1007/s00484-011-0454-1). UTCI-Entwicklung ist von European Commission via EU COST Action 730 unterstützt worden.
es: La implementación de UTCI utilizó el procedimiento operativo publicado en el International Journal of Biometeorology (doi:10.1007/s00484-011-0454-1). El desarrollo de UTCI fue apoyado por la Comisión Europea a través de la Acción 730 de COST de la UE.
fr: L'UTCI a été implémenté en suivant la procédure opérationnelle publiée dans l'International Journal of Biometeorology (doi:10.1007/s00484-011-0454-1). Le développement de l'UTCI a été financé par la Commission européenne via l'EU COST Action 730.
et: UTCI implementation used the operational procedure as published in the International Journal of Biometeorology (doi:10.1007/s00484-011-0454-1). UTCI development was supported by the European Commission via EU COST Action 730.
ja: UTCI implementation used the operational procedure as published in the International Journal of Biometeorology (doi:10.1007/s00484-011-0454-1). UTCI development was supported by the European Commission via EU COST Action 730.

en: According to ISO7243 an acclimatised person is one who has been exposed to hot working conditions (or similar or more extreme conditions) for at least 1 full working week immediately prior to the assessment period. If this is not the case the person shall be considered unacclimatised.
da: According to ISO7243 an acclimatized person is one who has been exposed to the hot working conditions (or similar or more extreme conditions) for at least 1 full working week immediatly prior to the assessment period. If this is not the case the person shall be considered unacclimatized.
nl: Volgens ISO7243 is een geacclimatiseerd persoon iemand die is blootgestled aan de warme werkcondities (of gelijk, of extremere condities) gedurende minstens 1 volle werkweek. Als dit niet het geval is, dan is de persoon niet geacclimatiseerd.
sv: Enligt standarden ISO7243 är en acclimatized person en person som har utsatts för varma arbetsmiljöer (eller liknande eller mer extrema miljöer) under minst en hel arbetsvecka före utvärderingen. Ifall detta inte stämmer så anses personen vara unacclimatized.
no: According to ISO7243 an acclimatized person is one who has been exposed to the hot working conditions (or similar or more extreme conditions) for at least 1 full working week immediatly prior to the assessment period. If this is not the case the person shall be considered unacclimatized.
el: Σύμφωνα με το ISO7243 ένα εγκλιματισμένο άτομο είναι κάποιος/α που έχει εκτεθεί σε θερμές συνθήκες εργασίας (ή παρόμοιες ή πιο ακραίες συνθήκες) για τουλάχιστον μία ολόκληρη εβδομάδα εργασίας πριν από την περίοδο αξιολόγησης. Εάν αυτό δεν συμβαίνει, το άτομο αυτό θα πρέπει να θεωρηθεί «μη εγκλιματισμένο».
it: Secondo la ISO7243 an acclimatized la persona deve essere stata esposta a condizioni di lavoro calde (o condizioni simili o più estreme) per almeno un'intera settimana lavorativa, immediatamente prima del periodo di valutazione. In caso contrario, la persona deve essere considerata unacclimatized.
de: According to ISO7243 an acclimatized person is one who has been exposed to the hot working conditions (or similar or more extreme conditions) for at least 1 full working week immediatly prior to the assessment period. If this is not the case the person shall be considered unacclimatized.
es: De acuerdo con ISO7243 una aclimatada persona es aquella que ha estado expuesta a condiciones de trabajo calurosas (o condiciones similares o más extremas), durante al menos 1 semana laboral completa, inmediatamente antes del período de evaluación. Si este no es el caso, se considerará a la persona no aclimatada.
fr: Selon la norme ISO7243, une personne acclimatée est une personne qui a été exposée à des conditions de travail avec des températures élevées (ou dans des conditions similaires ou dans des conditions encore plus extrêmes) pendant au moins une semaine de travail à plein temps immédiatement avant la période d'évaluation. Si ce n'est pas de le cas, la personne doit être considérée comme non-acclimatée.
et: According to ISO7243 an acclimatized person is one who has been exposed to the hot working conditions (or similar or more extreme conditions) for at least 1 full working week immediatly prior to the assessment period. If this is not the case the person shall be considered unacclimatized.
ja: According to ISO7243 an acclimatized person is one who has been exposed to the hot working conditions (or similar or more extreme conditions) for at least 1 full working week immediatly prior to the assessment period. If this is not the case the person shall be considered unacclimatized.

da: Du er mindre følsom (sensitiv) for varmestress end gennemsnittet
nl: Je bent minder gevoelig voor hitte dan de gemiddelde persoon
sv: Du är mindre känslig mot värme än genomsnittet.
no: Du er mindre følsom for varme en gjennomsnittet.
el: Είστε λιγότερο ευαίσθητοι στη ζέστη από τον μέσο όρο.
it: Sei meno sensibile al calore rispetto alla media.
de: Sie sind weniger wärmeempfindlich als durchschnittlich
es: Eres menos sensible al calor que el promedio.
fr: Vous êtes moins sensible à la chaleur que la moyenne.
et: You are less sensitive to heat than average.
ja: You are less sensitive to heat than average.

en: You are more sensitive to heat than average.
da: Du er mere følsom (sensitiv) for varmestress end gennemsnittet
nl: Je bent gevoeliger voor hitte dan de gemiddelde persoon
sv: Du är mer känslig mot värme än genomsnittet.
no: Du er mere følsom for varme en gjennomsnittet
el: Είστε πιο ευαίσθητοι στη ζέστη από τον μέσο όρο.
it: Sei più sensibile al calore rispetto alla media.
de: Sie sind mehr wärmeempfindlich als durchschnittlich
es: Eres más sensible al calor que el promedio.
fr: Vous êtes plus sensible à la chaleur que la moyenne.
et: You are more sensitive to heat than average.
ja: You are more sensitive to heat than average.

en: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecast.
da: Det grønne niveau indikerer at lavt termisk stress er forventet
nl: Groen: er worden weinig problemen met hitte verwacht
sv: Den gröna nivån innebär att låg termisk stress förväntas.
no: Det grønne nivået betyr at lav termisk belastning er forventet.
el: Το πράσινο επίπεδο σημαίνει ότι προβλέπεται χαμηλή θερμική καταπόνηση
it: Il livello verde significa che è previsto un basso stress termico.
de: Der grüne Stand zeigt, dass die thermische Belastung niedrig ist.
es: El nivel verde significa que se prevé un bajo estrés térmico.
fr: Le niveau vert signifie qu'un taux faible de stress thermique est attendu.
et: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecast.
ja: The green level means that low thermal stress is forecast.

en: The yellow level means that moderate heat stress is expected.
da: Det gule niveau indikerer at moderat varmestress er forventet
nl: Geel: er worden milde problemen met hitte verwacht
sv: Den gula nivån innebär att måttlig värmestress väntas.
no: Det gule nivået betyr at moderat termisk belastning er forventet.
el: Το κίτρινο επίπεδο σημαίνει ότι προβλέπεται μέτρια θερμική καταπόνηση.
it: Il livello giallo significa che ci si aspetta un moderato stress termico da caldo.
de: Der gelbe Stand zeigt, dass moderate thermische Belastung zu erwarten ist
es: El nivel amarillo significa que se espera un estrés térmico moderado.
fr: Le niveau jaune signifie qu'un taux modéré de stress hyperthermique est attendu.
et: The yellow level means that moderate heat stress is expected.
ja: The yellow level means that moderate heat stress is expected.

en: Safe reduction in clothing may lower heat stress.
da: mindre påklædning (uden at kompromittere sikkerhedsfaktorer som tøjet måtte give) kan reducere dit varmestress
nl: Luchtige kleding kan de problemen met hitte verminderen
sv: Mindre kläder (utan att kompromissa säkerhetsfaktorer) kan sänka din värmestress.
no: Ved å ta av deg noen klessplagg kan du forminske den termiske belastningen din.
el: Η μείωση του ρουχισμού μπορεί να μειώσει το θερμικό στρες.
it: La riduzione sicura della quantità di vestiti può abbassare lo stress termico da caldo
de: Reduktion der Kleidermenge kann die thermische Belastung vermindern.
es: La reducción segura de la cantidad de vestimenta puede reducir el estrés por calor.
fr: Une diminution prudente du nombre de vêtements peut diminuer le stress hyperthermique.
et: Safe reduction in clothing may lower heat stress.
ja: Safe reduction in clothing may lower heat stress.

en: The orange level means that high heat stress is expected.
da: Det orange niveau indikerer at højt varmestress er forventet
nl: Oranje: er worden problemen met hitte verwacht
sv: Den orangea nivån indikerar att hög värmestress väntas.
no: Det oransje nivået betyr, at høy termisk belastning er forventet.
el: Το πορτοκαλί επίπεδο σημαίνει ότι προβλέπεται υψηλή θερμική καταπόνηση.
it: Il livello arancione significa che ci si aspetta un elevato stress termico da caldo.
de: Der orange Stand zeigt, dass hohe thermische Belastung zu erwarten ist.
es: El nivel naranja significa que se prevé un alto estrés por calor.
fr: Le niveau orange signifie qu'un taux élevé de stress hyperthermique est attendu.
et: The orange level means that high heat stress is expected.
ja: The orange level means that high heat stress is expected.

en: This level is associated with severe heat stress.
da: Dette niveau er forbundet med betragteligt varmestress
nl: Rood: er worden ernstige problemen met hitte verwacht
sv: Denna nivån är associerad med allvarlig värmestress.
no: Dette nivået er assosiert med alvorlig varmestress.
el: Αυτό το επίπεδο σχετίζεται με σοβαρό θερμικό στρες.
it: Questo livello è associato ad un grave stress termico da caldo.
de: Dieser Stand ist mit ernsthafte thermische Belastung assoziiert.
es: Este nivel está asociado con un alto estrés por calor.
fr: Ce niveau est associé à un taux de stress hyperthermique sévère.
et: This level is associated with severe heat stress.
ja: This level is associated with severe heat stress.

en: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather worsens, your activity level increases or your clothing level increases.
da: Scoren stiger mod højere advarselsniveauer, hvis vejret forværres, dit aktivitetsniveau falder eller du tager noget af dit tøj af
nl: De score zal hoger worden als het weer warmer wordt, je meer kleding draagt of een zwaardere activiteit uitvoert
sv: Summan kommer att öka mot högre varningsnivåer ifall vädret förvärras, din aktivitetsnivå ökar eller din klädesnivå ökar.
no: Poengsummen vil øke mot høyere advarselsnivå hvis været forverres, aktivitetsnivået ditt økes eller mengden av klær økes.
el: Το σκορ θα αυξηθεί εάν ο καιρός επιδεινωθεί ή εάν το επίπεδο δραστηριότητάς ή ρουχισμού αυξηθεί.
it:
Il punteggio aumenterà verso livelli
 di avviso più elevati se il tempo peggiorerà, oppure se aumenterà la tua attività o il tuo vestiario
de: Der Stand wird sich nach höheren Warnungsebenen erhöhen, wenn das Wetter sich verschlechtert, Ihre Aktivitätsebene steigt oder Ihre Kleidungsmenge sich erhöht.
es: El puntaje aumentará hacia niveles de alerta más altos si el clima se agrava, aumenta tu nivel de actividad o aumenta tu nivel de ropa.
fr: Le score augmentera vers des niveaux d'alerte plus élevés si le temps météo s'aggrave, si votre niveau d'activité augmente ou si votre niveau de protection vestimentaire augmente.
et: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level increases or your clothing level increases.
ja: The score will increase towards higher warning levels if the weather aggravates, your activity level increases or your clothing level increases.

en: You should be able to maintain normal activities. You may experience higher thermal strain and more sweating than normal.
da: You should be able to maintain normal activities. You may experience higher thermal strain and more sweating than normal.
nl: Je kan het als warmer dan normaal ervaren en zweten. In principe zou je wel je werkzaamheden moeten kunnen uitvoeren
sv: Du bör kunna upprätthålla normala aktiviteter men du kan uppleva högre värmestress och svettas mer än vanligt.
no: Du burde kunne opprettholde normale aktiviteter. Du vil kunne oppleve varmestress og svette mere enn vanlig.
el: Θα πρέπει να είστε σε θέση να διατηρήσετε τις κανονικές σας δραστηριότητες. Μπορεί να αντιμετωπίσετε υψηλότερη θερμική καταπόνηση και περισσότερη εφίδρωση από το κανονικό.
it:
Dovresti essere in grado di continuare le tue 
 normali attività. Potresti sperimentare livelli di tensione termica e di sudorazione più elevati del normale.
de: Sie sollten normale Aktivitäten aufrechterhalten können. Möglicherweise erleben Sie eine höhere thermische Belastung und erhöhtes Schwitzen.
es: Deberías poder mantener actividades normales. Puede que experimentes una mayor tensión térmica y más sudoración de lo normal.
fr: Vous devriez pouvoir maintenir des activités normales. Vous pourriez expérimenter un plus grand stress thermique et un niveau de sueur plus élevé que la normale.
et: You should be able to maintain normal activities. You may experience higher thermal strain and more sweating than normal.
ja: You should be able to maintain normal activities. You may experience higher thermal strain and more sweating than normal.

en: Consider clothing adjustments, more breaks, and drinking more than normal; especially when the score approaches the red heat stress level.
da: Overvej flere pauser, mindre påklædning og hyppigere væskeindtag; især når scoren øges
nl: Bespreek en denk na over kledingaanpassingen, meer pauzes en drink meer dan normaal. Met name als de score richting rood gaat.
sv: Överväg att klä dig lättare, ta fler raster och drick mer än vanligt; speciellt när summan närmar sig den röda värmestressnivån.
no: Vurder å justere klesmengden din, ta flere pauser og drikk mere enn vanlig. Spesielt når poensummen nermer seg det røde nivået.
el: Σκεφτείτε να προσαρμόσετε το ρουχισμό σας, να κάνετε περισσότερα διαλείμματα και να πιείτε περισσότερα υγρά από το κανονικό, ειδικά όταν το σκορ πλησιάζει το κόκκινο επίπεδο στρες.
it: Considera di adattare il tuo vestiario, di effettuare più pause e di bere più del normale; specialmente quando il punteggio si avvicina al livello rosso di stress termico da caldo.
de: Überlegen Sie Anpassung der Kleidungsmenge und Pausen, und trinken Sie mehr als normal; insbesondere wenn sich das Niveau die rote ebene nähert.
es: Considera ajustes de ropa, más descansos y bebe más líquidos de lo normal; especialmente cuando el puntaje se acerca al nivel rojo de estrés por calor.
fr: Penser à adapter votre niveau d'habillement, à prendre plus de pauses et à boire plus que la normale, particulièrement lorsque votre score s'approache du niveau rouge d'alerte de stress hyerthermique.
et: Consider clothing adjustments, more breaks, and drinking more than normal; especially when the score approaches the red heat stress level.
ja: Consider clothing adjustments, more breaks, and drinking more than normal; especially when the score approaches the red heat stress level.

en: Pay special attention to drinking sufficient fluid during the first days with this heat stress.
da: Vær opmærksom på din væskebalance - især i de første dage med varmestress
nl: Zorg ervoor dat je voldoende drinkt.
sv: Var extra uppmärksam på att dricka tillräckligt med vätska under de första dagarna med denna värmestressen.
no: Vær oppmerksom på å drikke tilstrekkelig, spesielt i løpet av de første dagene med dette varmestressnivået.
el: Δώστε ιδιαίτερη προσοχή στην κατανάλωση επαρκούς ποσότητας υγρών κατά τις πρώτες μέρες που έχουν αυτό το θερμικό στρες.
it: Presta particolare attenzione a bere sufficientemente durante i primi giorni con questo stress termico da caldo.
de: Seien Sie darauf besonders aufmerksam, ob Sie während der ersten Tage mit thermische Belastung genügend trinken.
es: Presta especial atención a beber suficientes líquidos durante los primeros días con este estrés por calor.
fr: Buvez suffisamment pendant les premiers jours de cette période de stress hyperthermique.
et: Pay special attention to drinking sufficient fluid during the first days with this heat stress.
ja: Pay special attention to drinking sufficient fluid during the first days with this heat stress.

en: Consider adjusting activities (heavy physical tasks during periods of the day with lowest heat) and allow time to adapt.
da: Overvej at justere/planlægge aktiviteter så fysisk krævende arbejde/træning ol. placeres på de tidspunkter af dagen hvor varmen er lavest
nl: Probeer zware activiteiten op koelere momenten van de dag te plannen en neem de tijd om je aan te passen.
sv: Överväg att anpassa dina aktiviteter (tungt fysiskt arbete under perioder av dagen med låg värme) och ge dig tid att anpassa dig till värmen.
no: Vuder å tilpasse aktivitetene dine så fysisk harde oppgaver ligger i løpet av dagens kaldeste perioder. Gi kroppen tid til å tilpasse seg.
el: Σκεφτείτε να αλλάξετε τις δραστηριότητές σας (βαριές σωματικές εργασίες κατά τις περιόδους της ημέρας με τη χαμηλότερη ζέστη) και να αφήσετε χρόνο για να προσαρμοστείτε.
it: Considera di adattare il tuo livello di attività (mansioni pesanti a livello fisico durante i momenti meno caldi della giornata) e prenditi del tempo per adattarti.
de: Überlegen Sie die Aktivitäten anzupassen (schwere körperliche Anstrengungen an der kälteren Zeiten des Tages) und erlauben Sie sich eine gewisse Anpassungszeit.
es: Considera ajustar las actividades realizas (tareas físicas pesadas durante los períodos del día con el calor más bajo) y permitete algo de tiempo para adaptarte.
fr: Pensez à ajuster vos activités (concentrez les efforts physiquement importants pendant les épisodes de moindre chaleur de la journée) et donnez-vous le temps de vous adapter.
et: Consider adjusting activities (heavy physical tasks during periods of the day with lowest heat) and allow time to adapt.
ja: Consider adjusting activities (heavy physical tasks during periods of the day with lowest heat) and allow time to adapt.

en: Be aware that thirst is usually not a sufficient indicator when sweat losses are high.
da: Hvis du sveder meget skal du være opmærksom på at tørstfornemmelse ikke nødvendigvis er tilstrækkelig ift. forblive i væskebalance
nl: Drink op tijd, het dorstgevoel komt meestal te laat.
sv: Törst är sällan ett tillräckligt tecken när man svettas mycket.
no: Vær oppmerksom på, at tørst ofte ikke er en tilstrekkelig indikasjon på, når du skal drikke, når du svetter mye.
el: Λάβετε υπόψη ότι η δίψα συνήθως δεν είναι επαρκής ένδειξη ότι η απώλεια υγρών μέσω ιδρώτα είναι υψηλή.
it: Tieni conto del fatto che la sete normalmente non è un indicatore sufficiente quando le perdite di sudore sono elevate.
de: Seien Sie darauf aufmerksam, dass Schweiß normalerweise kein ausreichender Indikator ist, wenn man viel schwitzt.
es: Ten en cuenta que la sed generalmente no es un indicador suficientemente bueno cuando las pérdidas de sudor son altas.
fr: Soyez conscient que la soif n'est pas un indicateur suffisant lorsque les pertes en sueur sont élevées.
et: Be aware that thirst is usually not a sufficient indicator when sweat losses are high.
ja: Be aware that thirst is usually not a sufficient indicator when sweat losses are high.

en: Resting may lower heat stress.
da: Hvile eller flere pauser kan reducere dit varmestress.
nl: Rust kan de warmtelast verlagen
sv: Vila kan sänka värmestress.
no: Å holde pauser kan senke varmestressnivået.
el: Η ανάπαυση μπορεί να μειώσει τη θερμική καταπόνηση.
it: Riposare può diminuire lo stress termico da caldo.
de: Ausruhen kann die thermische Belastung vermindern.
es: Descansar puede reducir el estrés por calor.
fr: Vous reposer peut contribuer à diminuer le stress hyperthermique.
et: Resting may lower heat stress.
ja: Resting may lower heat stress.

en: Remember to compensate your sweat loss.
da: Vær obs på at drikke svarende til dit svedtab
nl: Denk er aan om je vochtverlies te compenseren
sv: Tänk på att kompensera för din vätskeförlust (svett).
no: Vær oppmerksom på å kompensere for vanntap (svette).
el: Προσέξτε να αναπληρώσετε  την απώλεια υγρών μέσω ιδρώτα.
it: Presta attenzione a compensare la tua perdita di sudore.
de: Seien Sie darauf aufmerksam, Ihre Flüssigkeitsverlust auszugleichen.
es: Debes estar atento a la compensación de tu pérdida de sudor.
fr: Assurez-vous de compenser vos pertes en sueur.
et: Remember to compensate your sweat loss.
ja: Remember to compensate your sweat loss.

en: The heat will impact your physical performance.
da: Varme kan (og vil sandsynligvis) påvirke din præstationsevne
nl: De hitte zal je prestatievermogen verminderen.
sv: Värmen kommer att påverka din fysiska prestanda.
no: Varmen vill påvirke den fysiske ytelsen din.
el: Η ζέστη θα επηρεάσει την απόδοση σας.
it: Il calore influenzerà il tuo rendimento fisico.
de: Die Hitze wird Ihre körperliche Leistung beeinflussen.
es: El calor afectará tu rendimiento físico.
fr: La chaleur va affecter votre performance physique.
et: The heat will impact your physical performance.
ja: The heat will impact your physical performance.

en: Adjusting activities and allowing sufficient breaks will benefit your overall daily ability to cope with the heat.
da: Justering af dine aktiviteter (eller tilstrækkelige pauser) kan gavne din evne til at fuldføre dagens opgaver uden overdrevne negative effekter
nl: Pas je activiteiten aan en zorg voor voldoende rust om beter met de hitte om te kunnen gaan.
sv: Om du justerar dagens aktiviteter och/eller tar tillräckligt med pauser kommer du att gynna din totala dagliga förmåga att hantera värmen.
no: Ved å tilpasse aktiviteter og tillate nok pauser kan du forbedre evnen til å takle varmestress.
el: Η προσαρμογή των δραστηριοτήτων σας, καθώς επίσης και η παροχή επαρκών διαλειμμάτων θα ωφελήσουν την συνολική ικανότητα σας να αντιμετωπίσετε τη ζέστη.
it: L'adattamento del livello di attività e la realizzazione di pause sufficienti porterà benefici alla tua abilità generale di reagire al calore.
de: Das Anpassen von Aktivitäten und das Zulassen ausreichender Pausen wirkt sich positiv auf Ihre tägliche Fähigkeit aus, mit der Hitze umzugehen.
es: Ajustar las actividades que realizas y permitirte suficientes descansos beneficiará en general tu capacidad diaria para hacer frente al calor.
fr: Ajuster vos activités et vous accorder plus de pauses affectera positivement votre capacité quotidienne à faire face à la chaleur.
et: Adjusting activities and allowing sufficient breaks will benefit your overall daily ability to cope with the heat.
ja: Adjusting activities and allowing sufficient breaks will benefit your overall daily ability to cope with the heat.

en: Increased airflow may be beneficial, even if skin is dry.
da: øget ventilation kan gavne din varmeafgivelse
nl: Een ventilator kan in deze omstandigheden verkoelend werken, zelfs als de huid droog is
sv: Ökad ventillering kan vara positivt även om huden är torr.
no: Øket ventilasjon kan ha en positiv effekt, også selvom huden føles tørr.
el: Η αυξημένη ροή αέρα μπορεί να είναι ευεργετική, ακόμη και αν το δέρμα σας είναι στεγνό.
it: Un aumento del flusso d'aria può portare benefici, anche se la pelle è secca.
de: Ein erhöhter Luftstrom kann vorteilhaft sein, auch wenn die Haut trocken ist.
es: El aumento del flujo de aire puede ser beneficioso, incluso si la piel está seca.

en: Increased airflow may be beneficial if skin is wet. Externally applied water to the skin (e.g. spray; instead of only relying on sweating) will reduce the risk of dehydration, and potentially enhance the fan benefit.
da: Øget vind/ventilation kan gavne dig - især hvis du er svedig på huden. Alternativ (hvis din hud er tør) spray vand på huden og kombiner med ventilator
nl: Een ventilator kan in deze omstandigheden verkoelend werken als de huid nat is. Je kan de huid nathouden met een spray zodat je minder uitdroogt door zweet.
sv: Ökad ventillering kan vara positivt ifall huden är fuktig. Genom att fukta huden (t.ex. med spray) kan det sänka risken för uttorkning samt öka effekten av fläktning.
no: Øket ventilasjon kan han en positiv effekt hvis huden er våt. Fukt av huden (f.eks. ved å sprøyte med vann), kan minske risikoen for dehydrering og potensielt øke nytten fra en vifte.
el: Η αυξημένη ροή αέρα μπορεί να είναι ευεργετική εάν το δέρμα είναι βρεγμένο/ιδρωμένο. Το βρέξιμο του δέρματος (π.χ. ψέκασμα, αντί να βασίζεστε μόνο στην εφίδρωση) θα μειώσει τον κίνδυνο αφυδάτωσης και πιθανώς θα αυξήσει την αποδοτικότητα του ανεμιστήρα.
it: Un aumento del flusso d’aria può portare benefici se la pelle è bagnata. L’acqua applicata esternamente alla pelle (per esempio spray; invece che fare affidamento sulla sola sudorazione) ridurrà il rischio di disidratazione, e potenzialmente aumenterà i benefici dell’uso dei ventilatori.
de: Ein erhöhter Luftstrom kann vorteilhaft sein, wenn die Haut nass ist. Extern auf die Haut aufgetragenes Wasser (z.B. Spray; statt sich nur auf dem Schwitzen zu verlassen) reduziert das Risiko einer Dehydrierung und vergrößert potenziell den Gewinn der Lüfter.
es: El aumento del flujo de aire puede ser beneficioso si la piel está húmeda. El agua aplicada externamente a la piel (por ejemplo aerosol, en lugar de depender únicamente de la sudoración) reducirá el riesgo de deshidratación y potencialmente mejorará el beneficio de usar un ventilador.
fr: Une circulation d'air accrue peut être bénéfique si la peau est mouillée. Humidifier la peau par action extérieure (spray, par exemple, plutôt de compter uniquement sur la sueur) réduira le risque de déshydration et augmentera potentiellement l'efficacité du ventilateur.
et: Increased airflow may be beneficial if skin is wet. Externally applied water to the skin (e.g. spray; instead of only relying on sweating) will reduce the risk of dehydration, and potentially enhance the fan benefit.
ja: Increased airflow may be beneficial if skin is wet. Externally applied water to the skin (e.g. spray; instead of only relying on sweating) will reduce the risk of dehydration, and potentially enhance the fan benefit.

it: L’acqua applicata esternamente alla pelle (per esempio spray; invece che fare affidamento sulla sola sudorazione) ridurrà il rischio di disidratazione

en: Keep yourself cool using ice packs, wraps, wet towels, wet sponges, foot baths etc.
da: Keep yourself cool, using ice packs, wraps, wet towels, wet sponges, foot baths etc.

sv: Håll dig sval, använd ispaket, blöta handdukar, blöta svampar, fotbad etc.
no: Keep yourself cool, using ice packs, wraps, wet towels, wet sponges, foot baths etc.
el: Κρατήστε τον εαυτό σας δροσερό, χρησιμοποιώντας παγοκύστες, βρεγμένες πετσέτες, βρεγμένα σφουγγάρια, λουτρά ποδιών κ.λπ.

de: Keep yourself cool, using ice packs, wraps, wet towels, wet sponges, foot baths etc.
es: Mantente fresco usando bolsas de hielo, toallas mojadas, esponjas mojadas, baños de pies, etc.
fr: Rafraîchissez-vous en utilisant des poches de glace, des serviettes humides, des éponges humides, des bains de pieds, etc.
et: Keep yourself cool, using ice packs, wraps, wet towels, wet sponges, foot baths etc.
ja: Keep yourself cool, using ice packs, wraps, wet towels, wet sponges, foot baths etc.

en: Pay special attention to young children, especially in the heat. Young children are more vulnerable because they are less able to lose their heat and do not adjust their behaviour by themselves.
da: Pay special attention to young children, especially in the heat. Young children are more vulnerable because they are less able to lose their heat and do not adjust their behavior by themselves. Most guidelines therefore contain recommendations for hot days.
nl: Let extra op jonge kinderen, voornamelijk in de hitte. Jonge kinderen zijn kwetsbaarder in de hitte doordat ze hun warmte minder goed kwijt kunnen en hun gedrag zelf niet aanpassen.
sv: Var extra uppmärksam med små barn, speciellt i hetta. Yngre barn är mer sårbara då de är mindre effektiva på att kyla ner sig och anpassar inte själva sin aktivitet. De flesta vägledningar innehåller därför rekommendationer för varma dagar.
no: Pay special attention to young children, especially in the heat. Young children are more vulnerable because they are less able to lose their heat and do not adjust their behavior by themselves. Most guidelines therefore contain recommendations for hot days.
el: Δώστε ιδιαίτερη προσοχή στα μικρά παιδιά, ειδικά στη ζέστη. Τα μικρά παιδιά είναι πιο ευάλωτα επειδή είναι λιγότερο ικανά να αποβάλουν θερμότητα και δεν προσαρμόζουν τη συμπεριφορά τους μόνα τους. Επομένως, οι περισσότερες οδηγίες περιέχουν οδηγίες για ζεστές μέρες.
it: Presta particolare attenzione ai bambini piccoli, soprattutto quando fa caldo. I bambini piccoli sono più vulnerabili perché sono meno in grado di perdere il calore e non adattano il loro comportamento da soli. La maggior parte delle linee guida contiene quindi raccomandazioni per le giornate calde.
de: Pay special attention to young children, especially in the heat. Young children are more vulnerable because they are less able to lose their heat and do not adjust their behavior by themselves. Most guidelines therefore contain recommendations for hot days.
es: Presta especial atención a los infantes pequeños, especialmente cuando hace calor. Los infantes son más vulnerables porque son menos capaces de perder el calor y no ajustan su comportamiento por sí mismos. Por tanto, la mayoría de las guías contienen recomendaciones para los días calurosos.
fr: Portez une attention particulière aux jeunes enfants, surtout par temps chaud. Les enfants en bas âge sont plus vulnérables car ils ont une capacité de déperdition de chaleur moindre et ne sont pas capables d'adapter leur comportement par eux-mêmes.
et: Pay special attention to young children, especially in the heat. Young children are more vulnerable because they are less able to lose their heat and do not adjust their behavior by themselves. Most guidelines therefore contain recommendations for hot days.
ja: Pay special attention to young children, especially in the heat. Young children are more vulnerable because they are less able to lose their heat and do not adjust their behavior by themselves. Most guidelines therefore contain recommendations for hot days.

en: Offer the children a drink often, preferably water. It is important that the children drink before they get thirsty. Therefore, keep an eye on whether the children drink enough.
da: Offer the children a drink often, preferably water. It is important to drink before the children get thirsty. Therefore, keep an eye on whether the children drink enough.
nl: Bied kinderen vaak drinken aan, bij voorkeur water. Het is belangrijk dat ze drinken voordat ze dorst krijgen, let er daarom op of ze voldoende drinken
sv: Erbjud barnen att dricka ofta, helst vatten. Det är viktigt att dricka innan barnen blir törstiga. Se därför atill att barnen dricker tillräckligt.
no: Offer the children a drink often, preferably water. It is important to drink before the children get thirsty. Therefore, keep an eye on whether the children drink enough.
el: Προσφέρετε στα παιδιά ένα ποτό συχνά, κατά προτίμηση νερό. Είναι σημαντικό τα παιδιά να πίνουν πριν διψάσουν. Επομένως, προσέξτε εάν τα παιδιά πίνουν αρκετά υγρά.
it: Offri spesso da bere ai bambini, preferibilmente acqua. È importante bere prima che i bambini abbiano sete. Pertanto, tieni d'occhio se i bambini bevono abbastanza.
de: Offer the children a drink often, preferably water. It is important to drink before the children get thirsty. Therefore, keep an eye on whether the children drink enough.
es: Ofrece con frecuencia bebidas a los infantes, preferiblemente agua. Es importante beber antes de sentir sed. Por lo tanto, vigile si infantes beben lo suficiente.
fr: Offrez souvent à boire aux enfants, de préférence de l'eau. Il est important pour les enfants de boire avant d'avoir soif. Par conséquent, surveillez si les enfants boivent suffisamment.
et: Offer the children a drink often, preferably water. It is important to drink before the children get thirsty. Therefore, keep an eye on whether the children drink enough.
ja: Offer the children a drink often, preferably water. It is important to drink before the children get thirsty. Therefore, keep an eye on whether the children drink enough.

en: Do not plan intensive exercise activities, adjust the rules of the game if necessary. Find a cool spot in or around the building. Sometimes it is more pleasant to stay inside than outside.
da: Do not plan intensive exercise activities, adjust the game. Find a cool spot in or around the building. Sometimes it is more pleasant to stay inside than outside.
nl: Plan geen intensieve activiteiten, pas het spel aan. Vind een koele in of om het gebouw. Soms is het binnen aangenamer dan buiten.
sv: Planera inte intensiva aktiviteter, justera lekar. Hitta svala platser i eller runtom byggnader. Ibland är det behagligare inomhus än utomhus.
no: Do not plan intensive exercise activities, adjust the game. Find a cool spot in or around the building. Sometimes it is more pleasant to stay inside than outside.
el: Μην προγραμματίζετε έντονες δραστηριότητες άσκησης, προσαρμόστε το παιχνίδι. Βρείτε ένα δροσερό σημείο μέσα ή γύρω από το κτίριο. Μερικές φορές είναι πιο ευχάριστο να μένετε σε εσωτερικό χώρο.
it: Non pianificare attività di esercizio intenso, regola gli esercizi. Trova un posto fresco all'interno o intorno all'edificio. A volte è più piacevole stare dentro che fuori.
de: Do not plan intensive exercise activities, adjust the game. Find a cool spot in or around the building. Sometimes it is more pleasant to stay inside than outside.
es: No planees actividades de ejercicio intensivo, ajusta las reglas del juego si es necesario. Encuentra un lugar fresco dentro o alrededor del edificio. A veces es más agradable quedarse adentro que afuera.
fr: Ne planifiez pas d'exercices physiques ou jeux intensifs, adapter les règles de jeu si nécessaires. Trouvez un endroit frais à l'intérieur ou autour du bâtiment. Il est parfois plus agréable de rester à l'intérieur qu'à l'extérieur.
et: Do not plan intensive exercise activities, adjust the game. Find a cool spot in or around the building. Sometimes it is more pleasant to stay inside than outside.
ja: Do not plan intensive exercise activities, adjust the game. Find a cool spot in or around the building. Sometimes it is more pleasant to stay inside than outside.

en: Do not let children play in the sun for too long and apply sunscreen with a high protection factor.
da: Do not let children play in the sun for too long and apply sunscreen with a high protection factor.
nl: Laat kinderen niet te lang in de zon spelen en smeer zonnebrand met een hoge beschermingsfactor.
sv: Låt inte barnen leka för länge i solen och smörj med solkräm med hög solskyddsfaktor.
no: Do not let children play in the sun for too long and apply sunscreen with a high protection factor.
el: Μην αφήνετε τα παιδιά να παίζουν στον ήλιο για πολύ ώρα και εφαρμόστε αντηλιακό με υψηλό δείκτη προστασίας.
it: Non lasciare che i bambini giochino al sole troppo a lungo e applica una crema solare ad alto fattore di protezione.
de: Do not let children play in the sun for too long and apply sunscreen with a high protection factor.
es: No permitas que los infantes jueguen al sol por mucho tiempo y aplícales protector solar con alto factor de protección.
fr: Ne laissez pas les enfants jouer sous le soleil trop longtemps et appliquez leur de la crème solaire à indice de protection élevé.
et: Do not let children play in the sun for too long and apply sunscreen with a high protection factor.
ja: Do not let children play in the sun for too long and apply sunscreen with a high protection factor.

en: Cool down with water games and swimming pools. Place the pool in the shade and make sure there is always supervision. Change the water every day.
da: Cool down with water games and swimming pools. Place it in the shade and make sure there is always supervision. Change the water every day.
nl: Laat de kinderen afkoelen met water spelletjes en zwembadjes. Plaats het in de scahduw en zorg ervoor dat er altijd toezicht wordt gehouden. Ververs het water elke dag
sv: Kyl ned med vattenlek och pooler. Placera dem i skuggan och se till att alltid ha tillsyn. Byt vatten varje dag.
no: Cool down with water games and swimming pools. Place it in the shade and make sure there is always supervision. Change the water every day.
el: Δροσιστείτε χρησιμοποιώντας παιχνίδια με νερό και πισίνες. Τοποθετήστε τα στη σκιά και βεβαιωθείτε ότι υπάρχει πάντα επίβλεψη. Αλλάζετε το νερό κάθε μέρα.
it: Rinfrescatevi con giochi d'acqua e piscine. Metti la piscina all'ombra e assicurati che ci sia sempre un supervisore. Cambia l'acqua ogni giorno.
de: Cool down with water games and swimming pools. Place it in the shade and make sure there is always supervision. Change the water every day.
es: Refréscalos con juegos acuáticos y piscinas. Colócalos a la sombra y asegúrese de que siempre haya supervisión. Cambia el agua todos los días.
fr: Diminuez température corporelle avec des jeux d'eau ou une piscine. Placez la piscine à l'ombre et assurez-vous qu'il y a toujours quelqu'un pour la surveiller. Changez l'eau quotidiennement.
et: Cool down with water games and swimming pools. Place it in the shade and make sure there is always supervision. Change the water every day.
ja: Cool down with water games and swimming pools. Place it in the shade and make sure there is always supervision. Change the water every day.

en: To make sure the little ones drink enough. You can, for example, add extra water to milk products. Food with a lot of moisture, such as fresh fruit (melon) and vegetables (cucumber, tomato) can also be offered to ingest extra fluids.
da: To make the little ones drink enough, you can, for example, add extra water to the milk products. Food with a lot of moisture, such as fresh fruit (melon) and vegetables (cucumber, tomato).
nl: Om ervoor te zorgen dat de kleine kinderen genoeg drinken kan er extra water aan de melk toegevoegd worden. Ook kan er voedsel met veel vocht, zoals vers fruit (meloen) of groentes (komkommer, tomaten) aangeboden worden.
sv: För att få de minsta att dricka tillräckligt kan du t.ex. späda ut mjölkprodukter med vatten. Servera mat med mycket vätska, t.ex. färsk frukt (melon) och grönsaker (gurka, tomat).
no: To make the little ones drink enough, you can, for example, add extra water to the milk products. Food with a lot of moisture, such as fresh fruit (melon) and vegetables (cucumber, tomato).
el: Για να κάνετε τα μικρά παιδιά να πίνουν αρκετά, μπορείτε, για παράδειγμα, να προσθέσετε επιπλέον νερό στα γαλακτοκομικά προϊόντα. Όπως επίσης, τρόφιμα με μεγάλη ποσότητα νερού, όπως φρέσκα φρούτα (πεπόνι) και λαχανικά (αγγούρι, ντομάτα).
it: Per far bere a sufficienza i più piccoli, puoi, ad esempio, aggiungere acqua in più ai prodotti caseari. Alimenti con molta umidità, come frutta fresca (melone) e verdura (cetriolo, pomodoro).
de: To make the little ones drink enough, you can, for example, add extra water to the milk products. Food with a lot of moisture, such as fresh fruit (melon) and vegetables (cucumber, tomato).
es: Para que los más pequeños beban lo suficiente, puedes, por ejemplo, añadir agua extra a los productos lácteos. Alimentos con mucha humedad, como frutas frescas (melón) y verduras (pepino, tomate).
fr: Assurez-vous que les plus petits boivent suffisamment. Vous pouvez, par exemple, ajouter de l'eau aux produits laitiers. Les aliments riches en eau, comme les fruits frais (melon) et les légumes (concombre, tomate) peuvent aussi être offerts pour augmenter l'ingestion de liquide.
et: To make the little ones drink enough, you can, for example, add extra water to the milk products. Food with a lot of moisture, such as fresh fruit (melon) and vegetables (cucumber, tomato).
ja: To make the little ones drink enough, you can, for example, add extra water to the milk products. Food with a lot of moisture, such as fresh fruit (melon) and vegetables (cucumber, tomato).

en: In order to participate in research, a researcher may need your ClimApp ID. If you give your ClimApp ID to the researcher you consent that your data can be used for research purposes. Please consult your contact person for more details.
da: for at forbedre (den forskningsmæssige) kvalitet beder vi om lov til at gemme din ClipApp id (bliver anonymiseret og kun brugt til forskningsmæssigt brug)
nl:
Om mee te doen met onderzoek kan een onderzoeker je ClimApp ID nodig hebben. Door het ClimApp ID aan de onderzoeker te geven stem je in met het gebruik van je data voor onderzoeksdoeleinden. Individuele data zullen nooit gepubliceerd worden.
  Voor meer vragen kun je bij je contactpersoon terecht.
sv: För att delta i forskning kan en forskare behöva ditt ClimApp ID. Ifall du ger ditt ClimApp ID till forskaren så godkänner du att din data kan användas för forskningsändamål. Vänligen konsultera din kontaktperson för fler detaljer.
no: For å delta i forskning, kan en forsker ha bruk for ClimApp-ID'et ditt. Hvis du gjir ClimApp-ID'et ditt til en forsker, godtar du at dataene dine blir brukt til forskningsformål. Vær vennlig å ta kontakt til kontaktpersonen din, for å høre mere.
el: Για να συμμετάσχει στην έρευνα, ένας ερευνητής μπορεί να χρειαστεί την ταυτότητα του ClimApp σας. Εάν δώσετε την ταυτότητα (ID) του ClimApp στον ερευνητή, συναινείτε ότι τα δεδομένα σας μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για ερευνητικούς σκοπούς. Συμβουλευτείτε τον υπεύθυνο επικοινωνίας σας για περισσότερες λεπτομέρειες.
it: Per poter partecipare alla ricerca, un ricercatore potrebbe aver bisogno del tuo ClimApp ID. Se fornisci il tuo ClimApp ID al ricercatore, acconsenti all’utilizzo dei tuoi dati per fini di ricerca. Per favore, consulta il tuo contatto per maggiori dettagli.
de: Eine Forscherin oder ein Forscher benötigt möglicherweise Ihre ClimApp ID um an der Forschung teilnehmen zu können. Wenn Sie der Forscherin oder dem Forscher Ihre ClimApp ID übergeben, stimmen Sie zu, dass Ihre Daten für Forschungszwecke angewendet werden können. en: Cold line - estimates cold risk based on ISO11079 IREQ, clothing and activity. The cold line can also give an indication of potential heat stress because of overdressing in cool environments - but does not take into account cooling by sweat.

sv: Kyllinje - uppskattar kylrisk baserat på ISO11079 IREQ, kläder och aktivitet. Kyllinjen kan också ge en indikation för potentiell värme stress på grund av för mycket kläder i kalla miljöer - men tar inte hänsyn till kylning på grund av svett.

it: Linea del freddo: stima il rischio di freddo in base a ISO11079 IREQ, abbigliamento e attività. La linea del freddo può anche dare un'indicazione del potenziale stress termico dovuto a un abbigliamento eccessivo in ambienti freschi, ma non tiene conto del raffreddamento dovuto al sudore.

fr: Ligne bleue (froid) - Estime les risques liés au froid en fonction de l'IREQ (ISO11079), des vêtements portés et de l'activité physique.
